ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.overview:
A group of African elephants was scheduled to be culled in the Kingdom of Sironjia due to elephant overpopulation. Instead, they have been offered to the zoo that creates the best and most suitable habitat for the animals. One crated African elephant has been delivered to your zoo and can be found near the front gate.
Create a wildlife exhibit for the elephant and ensure that its basic needs are met. If you can demonstrate your ability to care for this species, you will be given three more animals of mixed gender to help you establish a thriving community.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.overviewshort: A group of African elephants was scheduled to be culled in the Kingdom of Sironjia because of elephant overpopulation. Instead, they have been offered to the zoo that creates the best and most suitable habitat for the animals. Complete all scenarios in this campaign to unlock the sundial statue!
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.elephantpart1successoverview: The Kingdom of Sironjia is pleased to be able to offer you the remaining African elephants. The animals will be delivered to your zoo shortly. The habitat conditions will be monitored by the International Society of Animal Wellbeing (ISAW) for the next 3 months. Should you fail to meet the basic needs for any of these animals, they will be removed from your zoo and donated to another facility.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.result: Elephant herd successfully added to your zoo!
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.adoptelephant: Create an exhibit area to house your African elephant and then release it from its crate. Ensure that its environment need is met.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.finishadoptelephant: Great! Your new elephant seems content in its new exhibit area.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.meetneeds: Now that you have an appropriate exhibit, meet the basic needs of your African elephant.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.finishmeetneeds: Excellent! You have met the basic needs of your African elephant!
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.adoptfourelephants: Add the three crated African elephants to your elephant exhibit.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.finishadoptfourelephants: Great! All new elephants have been released from their crates.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.meetenvironmentfourelephants: Ensure your exhibit provides a suitable environment for your four elephants.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.finishmeetenvironmentfourelephants: Your environment is well suited to the four elephants.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.meetallneeds: Care for your elephants and strive to meet all needs. Their condition will be evaluated in three months.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.finishmeetallneeds: Your four African elephants have been well cared for! They are yours to keep.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.failedmeetneedsoverview: Unfortunately, ISAW officials are not satisfied that your facility is capable of providing adequate care for a herd of African elephants. The animals are being removed from your park and will be donated to an alternate facility.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.failedmeetneeds: Your animals did not do well in your facility. They have been sent to an alternate facility.
ElephantHerdScenarioGoals.finishmeetneedsoverview: ISAW officials are satisfied that your facility is capable of providing excellent care for your herd of African elephants. Your elephants are here to stay and the ISAW will contact you again should they become aware of other animals requiring suitable homes.

ZT2Strings.CruelConditions:
Mistreated Animals
An unnamed zoo in North America has been operating in an unregulated and uncontrolled environment. A series of animal abuse complaints brought against the facility have initiated an official investigation. The animals were found in poorly designed and poorly maintained facilities that did not provide for their health and psychological well-being. These mistreated animals need rehabilitative care.
Although your facility has so far only catered to small animals, you are one of the few in the area with vacant land. Due to the emergency nature of the situation, yours is the only facility capable of accommodating these animals.
A herd of zebras and a pride of lions have been delivered to your zoo. Create exhibits large enough to accommodate these two animal groups, and then treat their illnesses and provide basic care.
A series of animal abuse complaints brought against an unnamed facility have initiated an official investigation and resulted in groups of animals being removed from the zoo. Care for these mistreated animals in your facility. Complete all scenarios in this campaign to unlock the sundial statue! Your zoo has been able to provide excellent care for these animals. In the meantime, the offending facility has been shutdown permanently and another group of animals has been delivered into your care! You have been given a cash grant of $8,000 to help defray the cost. Abused animals restored to excellent health! Create a habitat suitable for six common zebras. Create a habitat suitable for eight lions. Cure any illnesses and meet the basic needs of these animals. The six common zebras are housed in a suitable habitat. The eight lions are housed in a suitable habitat. All animals have been cured of illnesses and their basic needs have been met. Create a habitat suitable for seven chimpanzees, and then cure their illnesses and meet their basic needs.

SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingoverview: Authorities have exposed an international smuggling ring that was illegally trading endangered animals. Many animals have been recovered in recent raids and are desperate for suitable homes. You have been given the opportunity to obtain several endangered animals if you can quickly prepare exhibits that will house them successfully. You will receive a new crated animal near the front gate at a regular interval for as long as you can maintain the happiness and welfare of the animals you have previously received. Further shipments of animals will cease on first report that any animal previously sent to your facility does not have its environment needs adequately met. You must make sure to provide the animal with enough space in an exhibit area of the correct biome.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingoverviewshort: Authorities have exposed an international smuggling ring that was illegally trading endangered animals. Many animals have been recovered and are desperate for suitable homes. If you act fast, several endangered animals can be yours. Complete all scenarios in this campaign to unlock the sundial statue!
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingFailureoverview: Sadly, you were unable to meet the environment need of your %s -- its exhibit was either too small or of the incorrect biome. It will be necessary for authorities to find an alternate solution.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingPart1Successoverview: You have successfully housed all of the animals rescued from an extensive smuggling ring. This Herculean effort on your part has ensured that these endangered animals will forever be protected from the threat of becoming merchandise on the black market.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingresult: Smuggling ring exposed! All animals rehabilitated.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingRedKangaroo: Time is of the essence! Create a habitat for the red kangaroo and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingRedKangarooOK: The red kangaroo is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingBengalTiger: A new animal has been delivered! Create a habitat for the Bengal tiger and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingBengalTigerOK: The Bengal tiger is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingGrizzlyBear: Another animal has arrived! Create a habitat for the grizzly bear and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingGrizzlyBearOK: The grizzly bear is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingGorilla: Another animal delivered! Create a habitat for the gorilla and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingGorillaOK: The gorilla is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingRhino: A new animal has arrived! Create a habitat for the black rhinoceros and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingRhinoOK: The black rhinoceros is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingElephant: A new animal delivery... only a couple more! Create a habitat for the African elephant and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingElephantOK: The African elephant is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingSnowLeopard: The last animal has been delivered! Create a habitat for the snow leopard and release it from its crate.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingSnowLeopardOK: The snow leopard is content in its environment.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingNeedPoints: Ensure the animals are happy and that their environment needs are met until the last animal has been delivered.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingNeedPointsDone: Congratulations! All of the animals have been housed in appropriate exhibits and you've been able to manage their happiness throughout the rush of placing all these new additions.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingAnimalUnhappy: An animal has become unhappy with its care or environment. Further animal shipments have ceased.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingAnimalDeath: An animal has died! Your facility is incapable of handling the influx of animals!
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingPart2overview: The animals you received were confiscated from a smuggling operation and had likely been poached from game reserves. Many of them may have been separated from their mothers while very young. It would be an incredible accomplishment to be able to return these animals to the wild. A cooperative group has donated additional animals to your facility so that your animals will have social companions. Meet the advanced needs of the animals so that you may release one animal from each species back into their natural habitats.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingMeedAdvancedNeeds: Meet the advanced needs and release one of each species to the wild.
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingMeedAdvancedNeedsDone: You have successfully released many endangered animals back into the wild!
SmugglingRing.SmugglingRingPart2Successoverview: Congratulations! You have successfully returned one of each species rescued from an international smuggling ring to their natural habitats, and your efforts are lauded by animal conservationists worldwide. In recognition of your efforts, you have been presented with a commemorative sundial which represents the timelessness of your achievement. You will be able to use this sundial in all of your future endeavors.
